name: ⚙️ Task
description: Template to create a new task
labels: team-proto
assignees: ''
body:
- type: textarea
  attributes:
    label: Task description
    placeholder: |
      Write here a meeaningful description of the task
  validations:
    required: true
- type: textarea
    attributes:
        label: Definition of Done
        description: |
            ```[tasklist]
            ### Tasks
            - [x] tendon replaced
            - [ ] joint tested successfully
            ```
